imdb.plot outline: Disney Playlist Sessions is a ground breaking new video series bringing you exclusive acoustic performances and covers from your favorite artists. From new artists launching their career on Radio Disney to the Broadway super stars behind Aladdin and Newsies Playlist Sessions shares incredible performances of Disney classics and new hits you'll love.
imdb.title: Disney Playlist Sessions
plot: _Disney Playlist Sessions_ (qv) is a ground breaking new video series bringing you exclusive acoustic performances and covers from your favorite artists. From new artists launching their career on Radio Disney to the Broadway super stars behind Aladdin and _News_ (qv)ies Playlist Sessions shares incredible performances of Disney classics and new hits you'll love.
